data: apple-tree | Hats | caps | bushel bags | Pockets

“Yer’s tu thee, old apple-tree, Be zure yu bud, be zure yu blaw, And bring voth apples gude enough Hats vul! caps vul! Dree bushel bags vul! Pockets vul and awl! Urrah! Urrah! Aw ’ess, hats vul, caps vul! And dree bushel bags vul! Urrah! Urrah! Urrah!”
Eustace Marchmont: A friend of the people
